experience: You and Lauren both know Eric Keosky-Smith, Mike Hawksworth, and 93 others
Creating a ‘Great Place to Work’ starts with culture, not perks
Tech Trailblazers: Pioneers who led the way for Utah’s rising tech industry

Have you ever had that moment where you stop for a second, reflect on how you got to where you are in your career/life, and feel really thankful/ blessed? I've had this feeling sitting with me since the beginning of the week, and it's a great feeling. Do some introspection and find motivation in your journey.
For the 5th year in a row, we were recognized as one of the fastest growing companies in Utah! Read more about this exciting news: http://plrsig.ht/2z0maIt

We're on a mission to squash the tech skills gap. My mission within Pluralsight is to grow our company through culture and leadership so that we can continue to create amazing impact in the world. I have the incredible opportunity of showcasing our stellar workplace and the people who make it happen through our employer brand.
My husband and I took a year and backpacked our way through Asia & South & Central America. Our amazing experiences spanned 15 countries, 161 places, and 377 days.

Before my husband and I left for our big adventure, I worked with teams on cultural design, recruitment strategy, & employer branding. Partners include the teams at Axosoft, Pluralsight, Pure Chat, Ethology, Sportiqe, and The Acme.

Joined to build the recruiting function and led our growth from 220-650 employees in 3 years at 40% YOY growth, from $20M to $100M in revenue, and ranking #25 then #13 on the Forbes Great Place to Work list for Small and Medium sized businesses. Our small and mighty People Leadership team built our people programs (leadership development, performance, engagement, internal communications)  and my team and I built the talent acquisition function (hiring process, leadership partnership, candidate experience, quarterly/annual hiring planning, employer brand, & internal engagement). We designed our HR functions to foster a culture for people to do amazing work. - Served on a VP-level team focused on performance and daily metrics to move the business forward- Presenter for LinkedIn Webinars on Hiring & Culture- Served on LinkedIn Talent Solutions SMB Advisory Panel- Led the Arizona IT Workforce Initiative with Arizona Commerce Authority & AZ Tech CouncilProgression in Roles: Recruiter, Manager, Snr. Manager

Designed an environment for our people to be happy, empowered, and engaged; driving the strategic vision of the company. -	Led culture committees in Phoenix & Denver office-	Employee Satisfaction Survey-	Led leadership development trainings -	New Hire Orientation-	Sales Hiring

recommendations: Michele M Tahtinen
Human Resource Professional
April 13, 2012, Michele M worked with Lauren in different groups

Although we worked together for a short period of time, I had the opportunity to witness the results of Lauren's hard work.  Lauren is a highly qualified professional within her field.  Lauren was a tremendous asset to our organization and we were sad to know she was leaving.  Lauren is an important contributor to any team she represents and she communicates effectively to all the employees.  Lauren consistently delivered positive messages and worked diligently toward team building.  Lauren is trustworthy and reliable and I highly recommend her for any company she chooses to represent.

Jesse Cook
Helping African companies to attract, hire, develop, and retain talent through LinkedIn
July 21, 2015, Lauren was a client of Jesse’s

Wow. Jesse is the best. I worked with Jesse for close to 3 years with him as our relationship manager. Jesse was not only our LinkedIn Relationship Manager, but he was also a trusted partner in our talent acquisition needs. He truly listened and heard what problems we were trying to solve and proposed solutions. Some solutions were LinkedIn products, some were tactics to better use LinkedIn tools, and some were tips that he heard from others that worked well. He helped us with finding tech talent faster, stronger talent brand engagement, & getting partnership from other leaders & departments. He was truly a partner in our talent acquisition strategies. He regularly went over & above. So thankful for his partnership and for his impact on talent acqusition!

Kelsey Lotus Wong
Creative Facilitator | Experience Designer | Culture Consultant
November 12, 2013, Lauren was a client of Kelsey Lotus’

Kelsey is pretty awesome. She is someone that energizes you just by being around her. As the community organizer, Kelsey led incredible mastermind sessions between large groups of people. She is super present to everyone's needs and you can tell she just loves people and loves the mission she's after! She has amazing follow-up, organization, and vision in her work. She brings 110% passion and energy to everything she does. The community is better because of her involvement in it. She truly has rallied many communities together and has elevated the people in them!

summary: I am all about elevating humanity through beautifully built companies, incredible leaders, and amazing workplaces.  My work is in designing and leading people programs that enable people to do their best work. My experience is in fast-growing tech companies, scaling People teams for growth. 		Strengths: Activator, Communication, Maximizer, Futuristic, Woo	Favorite Books: Start With Why, Good To Great, Work Rules!, Built On Values, Drive	Places You'll Find Me: TEDx, SxSW Interactive, GPTW, LinkedIn Talent Connect, Outside
name: Lauren (Tassiello) Hodgson
title: Culture + People Leader
